step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder movements are generally good, but try to bring your shoulder blades back and down a little more smoothly. Focus on the circular motion.
You're doing a great job squeezing your shoulder blades together. Remember to also pull them down to complete the circular motion. Keep up the good work!
Excellent! You've completed the repetitions. Try to inhale deeply as you roll your shoulders back to maximize the benefit for your breathing and lymphatic flow.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with your shoulder rolls! Focus on making the movement a smooth circle, squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Remember to breathe deeply as you roll back to help with lymphatic flow.
